column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello J P. - Thank you for your review. This is very concerning. May I please ask the date and approximate time you dined with us
column3: and with which manager you spoke about receiving the incorrect dish? If you don't recall the manager's name
column4: can you describe him or her? In a word
column5: this is not how we operate our businesses
column7: to be honest. I look forward to your response here or via private message.
